title: How to Create an Elegant White Room

steps.headline: Write down your plan on paper.
steps.description: This will help you to know what is needed and the direction you want the room to take.

steps.headline: Choose an accent colour.
steps.description: Having accents in your room will create the needed contrast and focal points. Black is a nice, stark contrast, which would make an even more elegant room, but you can use any colour you like the most.

parts.name: Changing the Room to All White

steps.headline: Paint the walls all white.
steps.description: If you have a dark room, you will need to layer many coats. Use long, even strokes in all one direction, and don't touch the paint while it's drying.

steps.headline: Purchase a new bed or remodel your existing bed.
steps.description: An antique or canopy bed in white would suit the theme nicely. Get suitable bedspreads as well. You could use white or your chosen accent colour.

steps.headline: Add a side table.
steps.description: Again, an antique wood side table in white would suit the theme quite nicely.

steps.headline: Include a dresser.
steps.description: All furniture should be white or whitish, preferably antiques. You can paint wood white if needed.

steps.headline: Put ivory or cream coloured shelves above your bed.
steps.description: You can put your books, DVDs, and CDs on them.

steps.headline: Hang a chandelier in the middle of your room.
steps.description: This does not have to be antique, but crystal or "fristal" (fake crystal) would work very well.

steps.headline: Place down a rug.
steps.description: Choose a deep pile one that you can sink your feet into it when you get up in the morning. Try a rug in your accent colour.

steps.headline: Add a floor lamp.
steps.description: Have it in white. Place it beside your bed.

steps.headline: Put curtains on your window.
steps.description: They should be simple black velvet curtains held up by an accent colour ribbon.

steps.headline: Include other accessories relevant to your taste.
steps.description: You could add a wall mirror, a wastebasket, etc.

steps.headline: Hang pictures of the Eiffel Tower and other beautiful landmarks on one of your walls.
steps.description: Put them in black or silver frames.

steps.headline: Hang your favourite pictures on your picture wall.
steps.description: Again, hang these in black and silver frames.

steps.headline: Get a cozy couch and glass top coffee table.
steps.description: Your couch should be white leather, or pleather if you're vegan or can't afford leather.

steps.headline: Put your sit-down items on your coffee table.
steps.description: Put magazines and your favorite books on it. You could also have a computer on there if you own one, or a TV.

steps.headline: Enjoy your new elegant, white bedroom!

text: Planning the Room Creation Write down your plan on paper. This will help you to know what is needed and the direction you want the room to take. Choose an accent colour. Having accents in your room will create the needed contrast and focal points. Black is a nice, stark contrast, which would make an even more elegant room, but you can use any colour you like the most. Changing the Room to All White Paint the walls all white. If you have a dark room, you will need to layer many coats. Use long, even strokes in all one direction, and don't touch the paint while it's drying. Purchase a new bed or remodel your existing bed. An antique or canopy bed in white would suit the theme nicely. Get suitable bedspreads as well. You could use white or your chosen accent colour. Add a side table. Again, an antique wood side table in white would suit the theme quite nicely. Include a dresser. All furniture should be white or whitish, preferably antiques. You can paint wood white if needed. Put in a vanity desk. This should be white. Put ivory or cream coloured shelves above your bed. You can put your books, DVDs, and CDs on them. Adding Accessories Hang a chandelier in the middle of your room. This does not have to be antique, but crystal or "fristal" (fake crystal) would work very well. Place down a rug. Choose a deep pile one that you can sink your feet into it when you get up in the morning. Try a rug in your accent colour. Add a floor lamp. Have it in white. Place it beside your bed. Put curtains on your window. They should be simple black velvet curtains held up by an accent colour ribbon. Include other accessories relevant to your taste. You could add a wall mirror, a wastebasket, etc. Adding Parisian Touches Hang pictures of the Eiffel Tower and other beautiful landmarks on one of your walls. Put them in black or silver frames. Hang your favourite pictures on your picture wall. Again, hang these in black and silver frames. Get a cozy couch and glass top coffee table. Your couch should be white leather, or pleather if you're vegan or can't afford leather. Put your sit-down items on your coffee table. Put magazines and your favorite books on it. You could also have a computer on there if you own one, or a TV. Enjoy your new elegant, white bedroom!
